newsitem.title: USA: GenCorp buys Printworld from Technographics.
newsitem.headline: GenCorp buys Printworld from Technographics.

text.p: GenCorp Inc on Thursday said it acquired the Printworld division of Technographics Inc of Monroe, North Carolina.
Printworld, a leader in the transfer printing industry, will become part of GenCorp's decorative and building products business unit, GenCorp said,
GenCorp is a diversified manufacturer of aerospace, defense, automotive and plastic products.
Printworld, which employs 170 people, had 1996 sales of about $33 million. It has been experiencing double-digit sales growth, GenCorp said.
GenCorp shares were off 1/4 at 19-1/4 early Thursday afternoon.
